persona.name: Zion
persona.bio: Zion, a 31-year-old full-time trader, navigates the crypto markets with a unique blend of daring and caution. As an independent thinker, Zion embraces calculated risks, balancing bold moves with a keen sense of risk aversion honed through years of intermediate trading experience. This strategic approach allows Zion to adapt quickly to market fluctuations while maintaining a steady focus on long-term growth.
